Sentencas: We designed and constructed a pressurized 5 kW anode-supported planar solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) power generation system with a pre-reformer for a fuel cell/gas turbine hybrid system.
Titulo: Operating characteristics of a 5 kW class anode-supported planar SOFC stack for a fuel cell/gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: The 5 kW class SOFC stack, which was made by Forschungszentrum Julich (FZJ) in Germany, was assembled and installed at KIER.
Titulo: Operating characteristics of a 5 kW class anode-supported planar SOFC stack for a fuel cell/gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: We also investigated the stack's typical operating characteristics, particularly with respect to the thermal cycling test, the fuel change from H-2 to pre-reformed gas, and the pressurized operation at 3.5 atm (abs.)
Titulo: Operating characteristics of a 5 kW class anode-supported planar SOFC stack for a fuel cell/gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: under hybrid operating conditions with a micro-gas turbine.
Titulo: Operating characteristics of a 5 kW class anode-supported planar SOFC stack for a fuel cell/gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: In atmospheric pressure, the output of the SOFC stack was 8.1 kW for the H2 and 4.7 kW for the pre-reformed gas.
Titulo: Operating characteristics of a 5 kW class anode-supported planar SOFC stack for a fuel cell/gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: When the stack with an liquefied natural gas (LNG) pre-reformer was operated in combination with a micro-gas turbine, the stack showed an output of 5.1 kW at 3.5 atm (abs.).
Titulo: Operating characteristics of a 5 kW class anode-supported planar SOFC stack for a fuel cell/gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: From the experimental results, we conclude that the anode-supported planar SOFC stack operates successfully in a pressurized hybrid system with a micro-gas turbine.
Titulo: Operating characteristics of a 5 kW class anode-supported planar SOFC stack for a fuel cell/gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: We also established a unique procedure and a basic technology in which the anode-supported planar SOFC stack could be operated under pressurized conditions in combination with a pre-reformer.
Titulo: Operating characteristics of a 5 kW class anode-supported planar SOFC stack for a fuel cell/gas turbine hybrid system

Sentencas: Moreover, we achieved successful operation of a hybrid system that combines an SOFC power system with a micro-gas turbine.
Titulo: Operating characteristics of a 5 kW class anode-supported planar SOFC stack for a fuel cell/gas turbine hybrid system
